title: Suddenly, I was Reincarnated in Another World as a Loli Saintess of Creation, an Unrivaled Job System - Novel Updates
tags: Beast Companions   Crafting   Cute Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Godly Powers   Loli   Male to Female   Monsters   Reincarnated in Another World   Royalty   Special Abilities   Survival
author: Shiina Kanso   椎名甘楚
description:
When Yukio Tateyama, a 31-year-old virgin, was on his way home from a party and thought he was stabbed to death by a street thief, he somehow woke up in an unknown forest. For some reason, he wakes up in a strange forest. Moreover, his appearance becomes that of a small girl of about eight years old, and even his speech and behavior regress to infantile.

According to an autonomous robot (?) that he met in the ruins of the forest,  this world has a system of skills, jobs, and levels, which makes it extremely difficult for a young girl to live.

In the midst of all of this, she gets a new name, Yuki, and uses her unknowingly acquired cheat skills to master all sorts of jobs, including magic, lumbering, construction, alchemy, and blacksmithing.

This is a story about a man who is reincarnated as a beautiful little girl, and even though he is thrown out into the forest, he uses the system to survive, and although he is supposed to be able to choose only two jobs in his life, he is the only one in the world who has all the jobs and is called the 'Saintess of Creation'.
>
